summary: Fixed STT plugin integration by restructuring into neotex.plugins.tools hierarchy, creating lazy.nvim spec, registering in tools/init.lua, and adding which-key voice group keybindings. Vosk model already installed via NixOS, created symlink for expected path. Documentation updated.

completion_data.completion_summary: Restructured STT plugin into neotex.plugins.tools hierarchy with lazy.nvim integration and which-key keybindings. TTS hook was already working - no changes needed.

next_steps: Restart Neovim and verify STT plugin loads via :Lazy and keybindings work via <leader>v
